review_text: 🚨🚨🚨🚨🚨🚨🚨‼️‼️‼️‼️‼️‼️‼️ 짜장면 시켰는데 이물질이 나와서 새로 주셨는데도 먹는 내내 계속 나와서 결국 다 못먹고 나왔네요 뭔지 모를 금색 이물질과 후라이펜 벗겨진것 같은 이물질이던데 개선되어야 할 것 같아요
translated_review: 🚨🚨🚨🚨🚨🚨🚨‼️‼️‼️‼️‼️‼️‼️ I ordered jjajangmyeon and found foreign objects in it. They gave me a new one, but the foreign objects kept appearing while I was eating, so I couldn't finish it and had to leave. There were some unknown gold-colored particles and what seemed like pieces from a frying pan. This definitely needs to be fixed.
The portions are generous, and the food tastes great.
Foreign objects found in the food.
